Description: Pacific Life agreed to pay $2.45 million to settle multistate litigation regarding its use of the Social Security Administration's Death Master File.
Info Source: Two Additional Insurers Agree to Appropriate Use of Death Master File, States News Service, March 23, 2015 (via Nexis).

Description: violations of New York Insurance regulations in deferred to immediate annuity replacement transactions
Agency: New York Department of Financial Services

Description: Pacific Life agreed to pay a $3 million dollar penalty in settlement of alleged violations of the New York Insurance Law in connection with the Company's pension risk transfer business by engaging in insurance business without a license.
Agency: New York Department of Financial Services
